import React from "react"; export default function OvernightCare() { return (

Overnight Care Program

Guiding Little Minds with Gentle Hands,

from Daylight to Moonlight.

Why Overnight Care?

Many parents in Midland work night shifts, long shifts, or rotating schedules. At Elsie‚Äôs, we provide a safe, licensed, and nurturing overnight option so you never have to choose between your job and your child‚Äôs wellbeing.

Our overnight program is designed to feel like a{" "} second home ‚Äî calm, cozy, and predictable ‚Äî with consistent caregivers and age-appropriate routines.

Overnight Schedule

  • üïï 6:00‚Äì8:00 PM ‚Äî Arrival, dinner, & calm play
  • üõÅ 8:00‚Äì8:30 PM ‚Äî Bath-time (if requested) & pajamas
  • üìñ 8:30‚Äì9:00 PM ‚Äî Storytime & night routine
  • üåô 9:00 PM ‚Äî Lights dimmed, soft music, sleep
  • üåÖ 5:30‚Äì6:30 AM ‚Äî Gentle wake-up & breakfast
  • üß∏ 6:30‚Äì7:00 AM ‚Äî Pick-up & daily recap for parents

Safety & Comfort at Night

  • ‚úîÔ∏è Small group sizes for individualized attention
  • ‚úîÔ∏è Cribs and cots with clean bedding
  • ‚úîÔ∏è Night lights & quiet, soothing sound environment
  • ‚úîÔ∏è Strict check-in/check-out procedures
  • ‚úîÔ∏è Real-time parent communication if needed

Overnight Spaces Are Limited

To keep our environment calm and safe, we accept a limited number of children per night. Reserve your spot in advance.

Call us or submit an Overnight Care Inquiry on the Enrollment page.

); }
